thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: KeaD

author: KeaD
title: KeaD
text: As a pharmaceutical representative I regularly do luncheons with healthcare providers. In the past I would pick up meals from the most convenient food places within the geography costing me valuable time out of the field, not to mention the car odor. Recently, while in a dr's office another rep was having lunch and told me about EZ caterer. That was one month ago and I have used them ever since with dozens of restaurant and catering options The biggest draw for me is ease of use. I don't want to spend time figuring out a "new" software and with eZ Cater I don't have to. EZ Caterer is so user friendly that I didn't have to read any of the how tos or watch any tutorial. Another feature is the receipt input into Concur for me so when I do expense reports I know longer have to scan meal receipts. Finally, another real bonus is the Amazon rewards option. Really, real easy!
